member.name: T:TribalTechnology.InformationManagement.Interfaces.ILog
member.summary: Interface for event/error logging objects to provide common methods for writing logs

member.name: M:TribalTechnology.InformationManagement.Interfaces.ILog.WriteLog(System.String)
member.summary: Writes the message to the eventlog as information.
member.param: The event text to be written

member.name: M:TribalTechnology.InformationManagement.Interfaces.ILog.WriteDebug(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a debug message to the log.

member.name: M:TribalTechnology.InformationManagement.Interfaces.ILog.WriteError(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a error message to the log.

member.name: M:TribalTechnology.InformationManagement.Interfaces.ILog.WriteWarning(System.String)
member.summary: Writes a warning message to the log.
